faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About BooksOfLife
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us by email or through our community.

items.title: How does the AI reading assistant work?
items.description: Our AI analyzes your reading context and provides explanations adapted to your knowledge level. You can photograph text, type questions, or ask for chapter summaries, and get instant, personalized help.

items.title: What types of books does BooksOfLife support?
items.description: BooksOfLife works with most non-fiction and fiction books. Our AI has extensive knowledge of popular titles and can help with academic texts, business books, literature, and more.

items.title: How accurate is the OCR text recognition?
items.description: Our OCR technology works well with clear, well-lit photos of text. The accuracy depends on image quality, but even with imperfect recognition, our AI can often understand the context and provide helpful explanations.

items.title: Can I use BooksOfLife offline?
items.description: BooksOfLife requires an internet connection for AI features. However, you can access your previously generated notes and reading progress offline.

items.title: How does the pricing work?
items.description: We offer subscription plans based on your AI usage needs. Different tiers provide access to various AI models and usage limits. All plans include core reading tracking and note-taking features.

items.title: Is my reading data private and secure?
items.description: Yes, we take privacy seriously. Your reading data, notes, and AI interactions are encrypted and stored securely. We never share your personal reading information without your explicit consent.
